isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - WEST COAST MAGNUM MIRRORS AND AERO MIRRORS - DESCRIPTION

svcsubsecinfo.para: This Service Section addresses mirror assemblies installed on International Model 5000i and Model 9000i trucks. Two mirror configurations are used on these vehicles: one is the heated West Coast Magnum which may be motorized or non-motorized, lighted or non-lighted, and may provide a CB antenna mounting (see Figure below); the second configuration is the Aero Tubular design with integral heated flat and heated convex mirrors (see Figure below). The Aero Tubular version may or may not have a motorized flat glass. The convex mirror is manually adjusted. CB mounting is provided on all left hand models and may be on right hand models.
